name: londondrugs_automation_poc
description: LondonDrugs Ecom and OMS automation with Cypress

scripts.sfcc:createAccount:test: cross-env PASSWORD=Apva@2025 TEST_APP=sfcc TEST_ENV=uat cypress run --spec 'cypress/src/specs/RegisteredUser_E2EOrderShipToHome.spec.cy.js' --headed
scripts.sfcc:registeredUser:test: cross-env PASSWORD=Test@123 TEST_APP=sfcc TEST_ENV=uat cypress run --spec 'cypress/src/specs/RegisteredUser_E2EOrderShipToHome.spec.cy.js' --headed
scripts.sfcc:guestUser:test: cross-env PASSWORD=Test@123 TEST_APP=sfcc TEST_ENV=uat cypress run --spec 'cypress/src/specs/RegisteredUserE2EOrderShipToHome.spec.cy.js' --headed
